data.message:
In my dreams
In this place where I must be.
Laughter and joy you will not see.
Trapped forever, or so it seems.
I escape here, in my dreams.
In my dreams, I leave this place.
Hold you in a deep embrace.
Oh, how I wish I could erase.
This miserable hell without a trace.
I dream I hold you near.
All my problems disappear.
In my heart, there is no fear.
A loving touch, or a gentle tear.
In my world the birds don't sing.
This solemn world with metal rings.
The steel bars close with ghostly pings. 
But, reunited...In my dreams.
By Sarah Sarah A Apland
